bibl.title: The Homeric aphar in the Oedipus Myth and the Identity of the Lille Mother.
bibl.note: P. Lille Inv. 76 abc (+ 73). - Re-examines the issue of the identity of the Lille mother by reviewing and evaluating our ancient sources.
bibl.seg: Tsitsibakou-Vasalos Evanthia, The Homeric aphar in the Oedipus Myth and the Identity of the Lille Mother.
P. Lille Inv. 76 abc (+ 73). - Re-examines the issue of the identity of the Lille mother by reviewing and evaluating our ancient sources.
